name: Slots Master
description:
★★★★★ THE BEST FREE-TO-PLAY SLOT MACHINES APP ON ANDROID

Slot™ is a new Vegas style slots app where you can play amazing video slot machines anywhere! Earn Chips and bonuses while moving up the experience ranking levels, play and compete with your friends and enjoy hours of pure entertainment.

App features:
-Free Hour Chips
-BIG WIN Mode
-Variety of video slots
-Bonus games
-In-app purchases
